UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Search for Shorter Portions of the Proline-Rich Antimicrobial Peptide Fragment Bac5(1-25) That Retain Antimicrobial Activity by Blocking Protein Synthesis.
Literature.Author: Mardirossian M, Sola R, Degasperi M, Scocchi M

Literature.Title: Fragments of the Nonlytic Proline-Rich Antimicrobial Peptide Bac5 Kill Escherichia coli Cells by Inhibiting Protein Synthesis.
Literature.Author: Mardirossian M, Barriere Q, Timchenko T, Muller C, Pacor S, Mergaert P, Scocchi M, Wilson DN

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human microvascular endothelial cells HMEC-1:30% Killing=64 µM,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:0% Killing=<32 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BW25113(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli BW25113(MBC=1µM),Escherichia coli BW25113 del-sbmA(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli BW25113 del-sbmA(MBC=>64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MBC=1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MBC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MBC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=>64µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=4-16µM),Escherichia coli deltatolC(MIC=1-4µM)
